name: Big Journey Road
description:
Big Journey Road is an arcade racing game featuring a mix of realistic cars and unrealistic powers. Online or offline, we got everything covered. Join now and experience untrue racing!

Features

  • Unexpected Race Outcome
  • Collectible Power-ups
  • Online multiplayer
  • Arcade Driving
  • Fun-packed action
  • Realistic Environments

Unique Powers

  • Boost - a short timed but powerful speed increase
  • AimShoot - a projectile traveling in a straight line

Other places where you can find us

  • Official Website
  • Development Blog
  • Discord
  • Instagram
  • Facebook Page

Controls

  • All major controllers and keyboard are supported
  • For the best experience, use Xbox One Controller

Keyboard

  • [Up/Down Arrows], [W] / [S] - Acceleration and brake
  • [Left/Right Arrow], [A] / [D] - Steering
  • [Space] - Handbrake
  • [Return] - Accept / Use Power
  • [Escape] - Quit, Back

Gamepad

Supports all major controllers. Tested with Xbox One controller, dual shock 4, nintendo switch pro controller.
  • [Left Stick] - Steering
  • [Right Stick] - Camera Control
  • [Right Trigger] - Acceleration
  • [Left Trigger] - Brake
  • [South Button]* - Accept / Use Power
  • [East Button]** - Back / Handbrake
  • [North Button]*** - Cycle Power
  • [West Button]**** - Drop Power

(South Button *) A on XBOX; B on SwitchPro; Cross on DualShock 4;

(East Button **) B on XBOX; A on SwitchPro; Circle on DualShock 4;

(North Button ***) Y on XBOX; X on SwitchPro; Triangle on DualShock 4;

(West Button ****) X on XBOX; Y on SwitchPro; Square on DualShock 4;
